DOC.brief_summary: This is a phase 1, open-label, dose-escalation clinical trial to evaluate the safety of SGN-75 in combination with everolimus in patients with CD70-positive metastatic renal cell carcinoma.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1b Study of SGN-75 in Combination With Everolimus in Patients With Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of metastatic renal cell carcinoma with confirmed CD70 expression Previously treated with at least 1 tyrosine kinase inhibitor (TKI) Measurable disease Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status 0 or 1 Adequate lung and renal function Prior treatment with antiCD70directed therapy Received more than one prior treatment with an mTOR inhibitor
